text: Smokey and the Bandit is a 1977 comedy movie produced by Mort Engelberg and directed by Hal Needham. It stars Burt Reynolds, Sally Field, Jackie Gleason, Jerry Reed and Mike Henry. The movie spawned with two sequels, Smokey and the Bandit II and Smokey and the Bandit Part 3. == Cast == *Burt Reynolds - Bo Darville ("Bandit") *Sally Field - Carrie ("Frog") *Jerry Reed as Cledus Snow ("Snowman") *Jackie Gleason as Sheriff Buford T. Justice ("Smokey Bear") ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1977 action movies Category:1977 comedy movies Category:American action movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Trucker movies Category:Movies set in Texas Category:Movies directed by Hal Needham
title: Smokey and the Bandit
